metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0082 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: actionpack/lib/action_view/template/text.rb in Action View in Ruby on Rails3.x before 3.2.17 converts MIME type strings to symbols during use of the:text option to the render method, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (memory consumption) by including these strings inheaders.

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
